name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A healthy and protein-rich salad with grilled chicken breast, mixed greens, and a light vinaigrette dressing.
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice
Wash and prepare all vegetables
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for dressing
Toss greens with half the dressing
Top with sliced chicken and vegetables
Drizzle with remaining dressing and serve

name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
description: A nutritious bowl packed with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and tahini dressing for a complete plant-based meal.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Cube sweet potato and roast at 400°F for 25 minutes
Steam broccoli until tender, about 8 minutes
Drain and rinse chickpeas
Make tahini dressing by whisking tahini, lemon juice, and garlic
Arrange quinoa, vegetables, and chickpeas in bowls
Top with fresh spinach and drizzle with dressing

name: Baked Salmon with Herbs
description: Tender baked salmon fillet seasoned with fresh herbs and lemon, served with steamed vegetables.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Line baking sheet with parchment paper
Pat salmon fillets dry and season with salt and pepper
Mix herbs, garlic, olive oil, and lemon zest
Spread herb mixture over salmon fillets
Bake for 15-18 minutes until fish flakes easily
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with ginger and garlic in a light soy-based sauce.
instructions: Cut all vegetables into uniform pieces
Heat oil in large wok or skillet over high heat
Add ginger and garlic, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli)
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, then add softer vegetables
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes
Drizzle with sesame oil before serving

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Layers of creamy Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and crunchy granola for a healthy breakfast or snack.
instructions: Mix yogurt with vanilla extract and half the honey
Layer yogurt mixture in glasses or bowls
Add a layer of berries
Sprinkle with granola
Repeat layers as desired
Top with sliced almonds and remaining honey
Serve immediately

name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
description: A protein-packed wrap with lean turkey, creamy avocado, and fresh vegetables in a whole wheat tortilla.
instructions: Slice avocado and tomato
Spread hummus evenly on tortillas
Layer turkey, avocado, lettuce, and tomato
Add red onion slices
Roll tightly, tucking in edges
Cut in half diagonally to serve

name: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty and nutritious lentil soup with vegetables and herbs, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Dice onion, carrots, and celery
Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat
Sauté vegetables until softened, about 8 minutes
Add garlic and cumin, cook for 1 minute
Add lentils, broth, and bay leaves
Bring to boil, then simmer for 25-30 minutes
Remove bay leaves before serving

name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
description: Light and fresh zucchini noodles tossed with homemade basil pesto and cherry tomatoes.
instructions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles using a spiralizer
Make pesto by blending basil, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan
Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth
Heat a large pan over medium heat
Add zucchini noodles and cook for 2-3 minutes
Toss with pesto and cherry tomatoes
Serve immediately while warm

name: Chicken and Rice Bowl
description: Seasoned grilled chicken served over brown rice with steamed vegetables and teriyaki sauce.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package directions
Season chicken with salt and pepper
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side
Steam broccoli and carrots until tender
Slice chicken and arrange over rice
Add steamed vegetables
Drizzle with teriyaki sauce and sprinkle with sesame seeds

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
description: A refreshing salad with chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese in a lemon-herb dressing.
instructions: Drain and rinse chickpeas
Dice cucumber and red onion
Halve cherry tomatoes
Combine chickpeas, vegetables, and olives in large bowl
Whisk lemon juice and olive oil for dressing
Toss salad with dressing
Top with crumbled feta and fresh parsley

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
description: Roasted sweet potato and black bean tacos with avocado and lime crema in soft corn tortillas.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F
Cube sweet potatoes and toss with spices
Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender
Warm tortillas in dry skillet
Mash avocado with lime juice for crema
Fill tortillas with sweet potatoes and black beans
Top with avocado crema and cilantro

name: Egg and Vegetable Scramble
description: Fluffy scrambled eggs with sautéed vegetables, perfect for a protein-rich breakfast or light dinner.
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper
Heat oil in non-stick pan over medium heat
Sauté onion and bell pepper for 3 minutes
Add mushrooms and cook 2 more minutes
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Pour in beaten eggs and gently scramble
Top with cheese before serving
